languages.text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Вы правы". {n}Паскаль обращается к команде уже другим, исполненным власти и силы голосом:{/n} "Техносоратники, внемлите моему повелению".
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Вы правы". {n}Паскаль обращается к команде уже другим, исполненным власти и силы голосом:{/n} "Техносоратники, внемлите моему повелению".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr habt recht." {n}Pasqals Stimme verändert sich, als er sich an die Crew wendet ... er spricht nun mit Autorität und Entschlossenheit:{/n} "Tech-Kameraden, alles hört auf meine Anweisungen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr habt recht." {n}Pasqals Stimme verändert sich, als er sich an die Crew wendet ... er spricht nun mit Autorität und Entschlossenheit:{/n} "Tech-Kameraden, alles hört auf meine Anweisungen."

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez raison », {n}répond Pasqal. Puis il s'adresse à son équipage sur un autre ton, plus déterminé et autoritaire :{/n} « Technoconfrères, écoutez mes instructions. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez raison », {n}répond Pasqal. Puis il s'adresse à son équipage sur un autre ton, plus déterminé et autoritaire :{/n} « Technoconfrères, écoutez mes instructions. »

languages.text: “谢谢你，大人。你说得没错。”{n}帕斯卡对全体船员开了口，他的声音发生了变化。此刻，他以充满权威感的坚定语气开了口。{/n}“技术同志们，听从我的指示。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，大人。你说得没错。”{n}帕斯卡对全体船员开了口，他的声音发生了变化。刺客，他以充满权威感的坚定语气开了口。{/n}“技术同志们，听从我的指示。”

languages.text: 「感謝します、陛下。その通りです」{n}そしてクルーに語りかける時、パスカルの声色が変わった。彼の声には威厳と強い意志があった。{/n}「技術同胞、自分の指示を心して聞け」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝する、陛下。あなたの言う通りだ」{n}そしてクルーに語りかける時、パスカルの声色が変わった。彼の声には威厳と強い意志があった。{/n}「技術同胞、私の指示を心して聞くのだ」
「感謝します、陛下。その通りです」{n}そしてクルーに語りかける時、パスカルの声色が変わった。彼の声には威厳と強い意志があった。{/n}「技術同胞、自分の指示を心して聞け」

languages.text: «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}, tiene razón». {n}La voz de Pasqal cambia cuando se dirige a la tripulación. Ahora habla con autoridad y determinación:{/n} «Tecnocamaradas, escuchen mis órdenes».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}, tiene razón». {n}La voz de Pasqal cambia cuando se dirige a la tripulación. Ahora habla con autoridad y determinación:{/n} «Tecnocamaradas, escuchen mis órdenes».

languages.text: "Teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Haklısınız." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi mürettebata seslenirken değişiyor, daha otoriter ve kararlı hâle geliyor.{/n} "Tekno yoldaşlarım, talimatlarıma kulak verin."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You are right." {n}Pasqal's voice changes when he addresses the crew — he now speaks with authority and resolve:{/n} "Tech-comrades, heed my instruction."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Haklısın." {n}Mürettebata seslenirken Pasqal'ın sesi değişiyor ve daha buyurgan ve kararlı konuşuyor:{/n} "Tekno yoldaşlarım, talimatlarıma kulak verin."
